summary: Implements a unified interface for OpenAI‑compatible services, encapsulating chat, text, embedding, image, speech, file, batch, and assistant operations. It abstracts provider‑specific details, supports synchronous and asynchronous execution, streaming responses, configuration translation, and standardized error handling.
business_intent: Provide developers with a single, consistent SDK to integrate a wide range of OpenAI‑style AI capabilities across multiple vendors, reducing integration complexity and enabling scalable, cost‑aware usage.
